author: definitelynotcharles7176
content:
> blockchain programming

Can you elaborate on what you think this means?

So, what I mean is, there's established sort of domains like front end programming, backend programming, dev ops, full stack, etc. Maybe data science/AI.

But what exactly is "blockchain programming"? Seems like a bunch of linked lists with some hash/cryptographic information attached. Maybe back-end related?

Maybe another way of asking this is, do you want a job working as a developer at one of these crypto companies?
